response.overview: Follows Hosea's memoir. God instructs him to marry a prostitute, Arianna, as a symbolic example. Spans 7 years in the DC area with childhood flashbacks. Portrays the struggles and hatred faced due to obedience to God's command, despite finding his wife.
response.tagline: Follows Hosea's memoir. God instructs him to marry prostitute Arianna as symbolic example
response.title: UNFAILING LOVE
